dcterms:creator: Y. Lecun
C. Cortes
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset contains 60,000 images of handwritten digits from 0 to 9. The authors conducted experiments on a reduced training set of 500 images to mimic the low-data scenario.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: The CIFAR-10 dataset contains 60,000 32x32 color images across 10 object classes. The authors compared architectures on a reduced dataset of 2000 images to mimic the diverse-yet-limited-data scenario.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: M. Eitz
J. Hays
M. Alexa
dcterms:description: The TU-Berlin dataset contains 20,000 hand-drawn sketches evenly distributed among 250 object categories, representing a scenario where the amount of training data is limited.
dcterms:title: TU-Berlin
